text: Ezɨ Moses kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “E kantrin kamɨn aven, uan Godɨn ofa damightɨ, a deraghan kogham. Guizbangɨra, e asɨzir Isipia ofa gamir puvatɨziba, e da isɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God en Godɨn ofa damightɨ, me asɨzir kabar ganigh naviba en ikuvigh, en atarɨva, egh dagɨaba e ginivightɨ, e arɨmɨghiregham. Kamaghɨn, e kagh ofa damuan kogham.
